article_title: Capital Township's Workfare program offers road to employment

article_metadata.description: A job.It's what makes Ralph Lee Davidson, 49, feel wanted after almost 25 years in prison and jail for murder and manslaughter.It gives Linda Smith, 47, a purpose for her life after moving beyond a heroin addiction and 15 years in prison connected with retail thefts to feed her former habit.And it helps Alan Berry, 50, pay his bills on time after his felony burglary conviction and four years in prison prompted so many potential employers turn away before even giving him a look."I'd rather be
article_metadata.author: Dean Olsen Staff Writer
